snippet: As it grappled with a takeover battle, Dell said its first-quarter earnings dropped 79 percent as the rise of mobile devices ate into demand for personal computers.
lead_paragraph: As it grappled with a takeover battle, Dell said its first-quarter earnings dropped 79 percent as the rise of mobile devices ate into demand for personal computers.

headline.seo: Dell’s Earnings Fall 79% as Sales of PCs Fade
headline.main: Dell’s Earnings Fall 79% as Sales of PCs Fade
